anime.name: Shin Manga Naruhodo Monogatari
anime.info: 新まんがなるほど物語

episode.title: sakura mankai da! hana no AIDORU NANBAA 1
gakkou kiritsu! kyou kara tanoshii ichi nensei
banri no choujou teki no shinnyuu SHATTOAUTO!
ofuroya-san hiro～i yubune de YUTTARI nonbiri
chou dendou denki teikou zero! ENERUGII dai kakumei!!
ohashi 2hon no bou de PAKKUPAKU!
SEMENTO KACHIIN! konete katamete BIRU ga tatsu!
MEGANE tooku mo KUKKIRI! chikaku mo HAKKIRI!
kenpou mamori masu! ai to heiwa to jiyuu no tame ni
taikyou umareru mae kara obenkyou?
meiro mayoi mayotte deguchi wo mezase!
POPPUKOUN POPOUN! to hajikete shiroi hana?
momotarou inu. KIJI. saru! otomo wo tsurete oni taiji
hikousen fuwari ukan da sora tobu kujira
tsuki no maryoku shinpi na hikari de kokoro wo toriko ni
USAGI ookina omimi wa REEDAA gawari?
ryuu (DORAGON) nazo no kaijuu! ten ni nobotte kamisama da!
houchou. manaita jouzu ni tsukatte oishii ryouri
tsuyu JITOJITOBETOBETO megumi no ame da!
taiyou ENERUGII SANSAN to hikari to netsu no okurimono
KOUMORI chou onpa REEDAA de yamiyo mo OUkei!
daiku dougu hiite DAME nara oshite kiru?
eisei housou denpa de musubu sekai no wa!
kasa ame fureba machi ni saku PARASORU FURAWAA
HAIBIJON IYAAN! ohada no are mo utsucchau!
RETORUTO shokuhin tegaru de benri! uchuu shoku ni PITSUTARI!!
HAABU shoubuyu oSHARE ni ieba HAABU no ofuro?
SUKUUBA.DAIBINGU umi no naka no himitsu heiki
ochuugen obon ni nose te kansha no kimochi wo okuri masu?
soumen. hiyamugi natsu da! hiyashite tabeyou TSUURU TSURU!
asagao asa ni nattara PATTO saku?
kofun mukashi mukashi no ookina ohaka
SAIKORO KOROKORO korogari nani ga deru?
KIUI. FURUUTSU igai na RUUTSU de bikkuri gyo uten!
RINIA.MOUTAAKAA sharin ga nai noni ressha ga hashiru?!
GOMI kiraku ni POIPOI suteru na POI!
koori atsui natsu kore nashi de wa iraremasen!
SEMI MINMIN naite mori no naka no ongaku kai
BIDEODISUKU e no deru REKOUDO
PAZURU ara fushigi naruhodo nattoku?
DEJITARU kimi no namae mo ichi. ni. san.?!
HACHIMITSU HACHI-san no daiji na hozon shoku
WAAPURO umai! hayai! yomi yasui!
omajinai ITAI no ITAI no tonde ike-!
ARI chika no oshiro da! fuyu de mo anshin!
GARASU KIRAKIRA hikatte toumei da!
chouju kenkou ichiban! nagaiki no hiketsu
kakashi tachiiri kinshi da! hatake no GAADOMAN
taifuu taiheiyou no abaren bou!
osenbei osen baa-san no bikkuri dai hatsumei!?
ireba EI!! yagyuu ryuu haire no jutsu
yane tsuki kyuujou ame ga futte mo PUREEBOURU
ORINPIKKU monogatari tsuna hiki tako age shoubousha!
kin MEDARU monogatari ase to namida to kandou to!!
POSUTO kyou mo anata no tayori matsu
yochi nouryoku PIPI!! mirai no jibun ga miete kuru
denwa PIPPOPPA!! tojimari hinomoto hi no youjin
kanjin you tottemo daiji na tokoro desu
sabaku suna no umi ROMANCHIKKU wa kiken na shirase!
NIKIBI IYAAN dekichatta! watashi seishun MAZzakari
sukiya ki suki no ue de niku wo yaku?
sui YARE fure! SORE fure! seimei no minamoto
ryuugaku seimei wo kake umi wo watatte benkyou da!!
SOROBAN dentaku nanka ni makenai zo
kyou goyou muyou! goyou no nai mono tooshimasen
obei itadakima-su! bushi no SARARII 50 seki?
tatami WARA da IGUSA da nipponjin!
sumi oishii SANMA wa sekigaisen
fuyu o atatakaku sugosu houhou fuyushougun wo NOKKUAUTO
SOUSU oishisa baibai GURUME no mikata
hanga hotte ukiyo no usa barashi!?
ninja shuriken makibishi henshin no jutsu!
NINJIN eiyou manten! DAIDAI shoku wa BITAMIN A
SUKII subette koron de yuki DARUMA
do chikyuu no takara da! taisetsu ni!!
